title: Arcade Hacker Hideout Adventure #62
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Abandoned Arcade Floor
rooms.description: A dimly lit arcade filled with vintage game cabinets covered in dust and cobwebs. Neon signs flicker overhead casting colorful shadows. The air smells of old electronics and stale popcorn. Several arcade machines line the walls, and a locked door leads to the back room.

items.name: Pacman arcade cabinet
items.description: A classic yellow Pacman cabinet with a glowing screen showing the high score
items.text: HIGH SCORE: 1980 - Initials: TN (Toru Nakamura). A note is taped to the side: 'The year the ghosts first chased us.'

items.name: Space Invaders cabinet
items.description: A black cabinet with alien graphics and a worn joystick
items.text: HIGH SCORE: 1978 - Initials: TN. The screen displays: 'Remember when the invasion began.'

items.name: Donkey Kong cabinet
items.description: A red cabinet showing Mario climbing ladders to save the princess
items.text: HIGH SCORE: 1981 - Initials: SM (Shigeru Miyamoto). A sticky note reads: 'The year the carpenter became a hero.'

items.name: dusty prize counter
items.description: An old counter with a locked cabinet underneath and a cash register on top

items.name: magnetic access keycard
items.description: A black keycard with a green stripe and the word ADMIN printed on it

items.name: overflowing trash bin
items.description: A metal bin filled with empty energy drink cans and crumpled papers

items.name: crumpled hacker note
items.description: A handwritten note on lined paper
items.text: HACKER COLLECTIVE RULES: 1. Username is always root. 2. Password is the name of our hideout in lowercase. 3. The vault code is written under the Galaga machine. Stay 1337!

items.name: Galaga arcade machine
items.description: A blue cabinet with spaceship graphics. Something is written underneath in marker.
items.text: On the underside of the cabinet, someone has scrawled in permanent marker: 'Server vault combo = 8008' with a smiley face.

items.name: reinforced back room door
items.description: A heavy metal door with a card reader and a sign that says AUTHORIZED PERSONNEL ONLY

rooms.name: Hacker Workshop
rooms.description: A cluttered room filled with computer equipment, tangled cables, and multiple monitors displaying scrolling code. LED strips cast a purple glow. Posters of classic arcade games and hacker manifestos cover the walls. A massive server room door dominates the east wall.

items.name: electronics workbench
items.description: A bench covered with circuit boards, soldering irons, and tools

items.name: heavy duty wire cutters
items.description: Professional wire cutters with rubber grips

items.name: main computer desk
items.description: A desk with three monitors and a mechanical keyboard. Sticky notes are everywhere.

items.name: password sticky note
items.description: A yellow sticky note with login information
items.text: LOGIN INFO - User: root | Pass: arcade (all lowercase) | Remember: The hideout is called the ARCADE!

items.name: encrypted USB drive
items.description: A black USB drive with a skull sticker

items.name: cork bulletin board
items.description: A board covered with photos, notes, and newspaper clippings
items.text: Various clippings about arcade history. One article is highlighted: 'The Golden Age of Arcades began in 1978 with Space Invaders, peaked in 1980 with Pacman, and continued through 1981 with Donkey Kong.'

items.name: reinforced server room door
items.description: A massive steel door with a digital keypad and biometric scanner. A screen displays three security questions.

password_questions.question: Enter admin username:
password_questions.hint: Check the hacker manifest and login credentials

password_questions.question: Enter password:
password_questions.hint: The password sticky note has this information

password_questions.question: Enter vault access code:
password_questions.hint: Look under the Galaga machine in the arcade

rooms.name: Secret Data Vault
rooms.description: You have breached the inner sanctum! A climate controlled room filled with server racks humming with power. Holographic displays float in the air showing streams of encrypted data. In the center, a terminal glows with the message DATA BREACH SUCCESSFUL. Stacks of hard drives and backup tapes line the shelves. You have found the hackers secret data cache!

items.name: primary server terminal
items.description: A powerful server with multiple hard drives and blinking status lights

items.name: encrypted data storage
items.description: Rows of hard drives containing valuable stolen data and cryptocurrency wallets

items.name: floating holographic screen
items.description: A display showing mission accomplished and access granted to all systems

rooms.win_message: SUCCESS! You have infiltrated the Arcade Hacker Hideout and gained access to the secret data vault! The encrypted files are yours, and you have proven yourself a master hacker. Time to download the data and disappear before anyone notices. You win!
